bug.author: zabbasi
bug.summary: Install istio for the exiting kfctl e2e test
bug.description:
The presubmit test workflow <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/testing/workflows/components/kfctl_test.jsonnet>kfctl-test</denchmark-link> uses <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/scripts/kfctl.sh>scripts/kfctl.sh</denchmark-link> to deploy Kubeflow and does not install istio. However currently notebook-controller have a dependency on VirtualServices. That's why the test fails for any update on the notebooks-controller image update. Kfctl-test performs some component specific tests which is missing in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/testing/workflows/components/kfctl_go_test.jsonnet>kfctl-go-test</denchmark-link> . Therefore, we need to either merge the two tests or install instio on kfctl-test. related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3306>#3306</denchmark-link>
blocked <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3318>#3318</denchmark-link>
